subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As of Tuesday, Oliver Perez is a reliever, the path chosen by the Mets to restore his confidence, return him to their rotation and reap some return on their $36 million investment.
snippet: As of Tuesday, Oliver Perez is a reliever, the path chosen by the Mets to restore his confidence, return him to their rotation and reap some return on their $36 million investment.
